home.title: DocumentInvoiceWorkflows
home.createLabel: Créer un nouveau Document Invoice Workflow
home.createOrEditLabel: Créer ou éditer un Document Invoice Workflow

documentInvoiceWorkflow.created: Un nouveau Document Invoice Workflow a été créé avec l'identifiant {{ param }}
documentInvoiceWorkflow.updated: Le Document Invoice Workflow avec l'identifiant {{ param }} a été mis à jour
documentInvoiceWorkflow.deleted: Le Document Invoice Workflow avec l'identifiant {{ param }} a été supprimé

delete.question: Etes-vous certain de vouloir supprimer le Document Invoice Workflow {{ id }} ?

help.status: status of a document that the workflow is for; possible values: R - payment reminder, R1 - 1st reminder, R2 - 2nd reminder, R3 - 3rd reminder
help.overdueDays: how many days after due date action should be taken ,
help.action: action that should be taken; possible values: M - remind me, CE - remind contact by email, CP - remind contact by post
help.contactEmail: email address for reminding contact (valid only when action is CE)
help.speed: post speed for reminding contact (valid only when action is CP); possible values: P - priority, E - economy
